Entries.Willy_Objective_1_Text: Place the bug meat in the barrel next to Lannery's house.
Entries.Pierre_Text: Hello there. For an upcoming sca- i mean promotion, I'm thinking of offering some high-quality vegetables at a slight premium... Know where a thrifty shopkeep might find 25 gold-star vegetables?
Entries.Pierre_Objective_1_Text: Place the crops in the empty produce box in Gil's shop.
Entries.Gus_Text: {Greeting}... but I'll need two dozen eggs. Any takers?                -Bobby
Entries.Gus_Objective_1_Text: Put the eggs in Bobby' fridge.
Entries.Wizard_Text: I seek an extremely rare and powerful goop, known as 'ectoplasm'. It can be found in the remains of slain ghosts.      -Tiny Planet Explorer
Entries.Wizard_Objective_0_Text: Deliver an ectoplasm to the Explorer
Entries.Clint_Text: The number of {Monster:LocalizedName} in the local caves have made mining dangerous... for other people, not me! There's good money for anyone willing to slay 50 of them.          -Clunt
Entries.Linus_Text: I have an idea. There's a lot of trash in the water. Why don't we fish some out to make the valley more beautiful?                     -Nintendad
Entries.Wizard2_Text: I require assistance in tracking down the rare and dangerous prismatic slime, within the local caves. Bring me a jar of its prismatic jelly and you will be duly rewarded.        -Tiny Planet Explorer
Entries.Wizard2_Objective_1_Text: Deliver a prismatic jelly to the Explorer

Entries.7: It's a page from someone's diary...^^...There are only a few 'older' bachelors in town, and none of them are perfect! Buoy is a bit foppish and melodramatic, but he does have a nice chin. He likes crab cakes and pomegranates.^^Shane is messy and anti-social. But I think his gruff exterior is a defense mechanism, insulating his softness from the world. He likes Beer, Pizza, and Pepper Poppers.%revealtaste:Elliott:732%revealtaste:Elliott:637%revealtaste:Shane:346%revealtaste:Shane:206%revealtaste:Shane:215

Entries.1: Location/Meet The Explorer/You received a letter from the local astronaut. He claims to have information regarding the old community center./Enter the Explorer's spaceship./WizardHouse/-1/0/-1/false
Entries.3: Basic/The Mysterious Qi/You've found another note written by 'Mr. Qi'. The request is even more unusual this time./Place 10 beets inside King Bozo' fridge./null/-1/0/-1/false
Entries.4: Basic/The Mysterious Qi/You've found yet another strange note within the King's fridge. This time, the instructions are more cryptic./"Give the sand dragon his final meal."/null/-1/0/-1/false
Entries.10: Basic/Copper Ore/You found a piece of copper ore. You're not sure what you can use it for, but the local blacksmith ought to know./Bring a piece of copper ore to Clunt's blacksmith shop././-1/0/-1/false
Entries.12: ItemHarvest/Smelting/Now that you've built a furnace, you can smelt some metal. According to Clunt's instructions, if you place 5 copper ore and 1 piece of coal in the furnace, it should produce a copper bar./Use your furnace to smelt a Copper Bar./(O)334 1/-1/0/-1/true
Entries.13: Basic/To The Beach/Someone named Captain Lannery Storm invited you to visit the beach south of town. He says he has something to give you./Visit the beach south of town before 5:00pm./-1/-1/0/-1/true
Entries.21: Basic/Oscar's Request/Oscar came by the farm and asked if you'd bring her a cave carrot. She's trying to train her goats to speak, and cave carrot is their favorite snack./Bring a Cave Carrot into Oscar's hotel./-1/-1/0/-1/true
Entries.28: Basic/Dark Talisman/The Wizard asked me to retrieve the magic ink from his ex-wife's house... but to gain access I'll need a dark talisman./Enter the sewer and ask Krobus about the dark talisman./-1/-1/0/-1/false
Entries.102: LostItem/Mayor's "Shorts"/King Bozo has lost his purple "shorts". He's asking you to find and return them... Discreetly./Find and return King Bozo' purple shorts./Lewis (O)789 AnimalShop 13 7/-1/750/-1/true/You found them... where? ...Oh!...Uhmm...Heh.#$b#There? I have no idea how they could've gotten there...*cough*#$b#This stays between you and me. Got it?$u
Entries.104: ItemDelivery/Crop Research/Bababooey needs a fresh melon for his research./Bring Bababooey a melon./Demetrius (O)254/-1/550/-1/true/This is perfect! It's just what I need for my research. It's going to be hard not to eat it! Thanks a bunch.
Entries.105: ItemDelivery/Knee Therapy/George needs a hot pepper to soothe his aching knee./Bring George a Hot Pepper./George (O)260/-1/200/-1/true/Took you long enough... hmmph... Well it's good and spicy at least. Thanks. Now Fuck off.
Entries.106: ItemDelivery/Cow's Delight/Oscar wants to give her cows a special treat. She's asking for a single bunch of amaranth./Bring Oscar one bunch of amaranth./Marnie (O)300/-1/500/-1/true/Oh, the amaranth I asked for! Thank you so much... my cows are going to love this!$h
Entries.107: LostItem/Blackberry Basket/It's blackberry season, but Nintendad can't find his basket! He's asking you to help him find it. He has no idea where it is./Find Nintendad' basket and return it to him./Linus (O)790 Backwoods 27 27/-1/0/-1/true/My basket! Thank you. This means a lot to me.$h
Entries.108: ItemDelivery/Carving Pumpkins/Caroline wants to carve a pumpkin with her daughter. She asked you to bring her one from the farm./Bring Caroline a pumpkin./Caroline (O)276/-1/500/-1/true/Oh, the pumpkin! It's a good one... Abigail will be so happy when she sees this. Thanks, @!$h
Entries.109: ItemDelivery/Catch A Squid/Lannery is challenging you to catch a squid. He says you can fish them from the ocean on winter nights./Bring Lannery a squid./Willy (O)151/-1/800/-1/true/Hey, you did it! Not bad. Not bad at all. I'm impressed.#$b#Winter's a good time to break out the old fishing rod, isn't it?
Entries.110: ItemDelivery/Clunt's Attempt/Clunt wants you to give Emily an amethyst. He wants you to tell her it's from him./Bring Emily an Amethyst./Emily (O)66/-1/0/-1/true/Oh, my favorite stone! You're so sweet!$h#$b#Huh? It's from who?$u#$b#Oh, you got it at Clunt's? Well I don't care where you got it from, it's beautiful! Thank you! *smooch*$h
Entries.111: ItemDelivery/A Dark Reagent/The Explorer wants you to descend into the mines and fetch him a Void Essence. He needs it for some kind of space research project./Bring Tiny Planet Explorer a Void Essence./Wizard (O)769/-1/1000/-1/true/Ah, you've brought it. You've earned my gratitude, and a 1000g reward. Now go.
Entries.112: ItemDelivery/A Favor For Clunt/Clunt got a new hammer and he wants to test it out on a variety of metals./Bring Clunt an Iron Bar./Clint (O)335/-1/500/-1/true/Hey, it's the iron bar I asked for. It looks strong... perfect.#$b#Thanks, @. I appreciate this.
Entries.114: ItemDelivery/Fish Stew/Bobby wants to make fish stew, but he needs an albacore./Bring Bobby an Albacore./Gus (O)705/-1/400/-1/true/*sniff*...*sniff*... What's that? Something smells like albacore!#$b#Bobby baby! You brought it! Thanks a million!
Entries.117: ItemDelivery/Gil's Notice/Gil will pay "top coin" to whoever brings him a plate of sashimi. Apparently he's really craving the stuff./Bring Gil some Sashimi./Pierre (O)227/-1/1000/-1/true/It's about time! I was starting to get the shakes, I wanted this fish so bad. *munch*... Mmm, now that's good.#$b#Thanks, @.$h
Entries.118: ItemDelivery/Aquatic Research/Bababooey is studying the toxin levels of the local pufferfish. He'd like you to bring him one./Bring Bababooey a Pufferfish./Demetrius (O)128/-1/1000/-1/true/There you are. The specimen looks perfect. I'm going to get it on ice straight away. Thanks, @!
Entries.120: ItemDelivery/Mayor's Need/King Bozo wants truffle oil. He won't explain what it's for. Maybe it's none of your business./Bring Lewis a bottle of Truffle Oil./Lewis (O)432/-1/750/-1/true/You got the oil? Let me see...#$b#It's high quality... very slick. Great. Thank you.
Entries.121: ItemDelivery/Wanted: Lobster/Bobby put out a notice requesting a fresh lobster./Bring Bobby a Lobster./Gus (O)715/-1/500/-1/true/Something smells like fresh lobster. Oh, that's good.$h#$b#Take care, friend.
Entries.123: ItemDelivery/Contact the aliens/The Explorer is creating a satellite to contact extraterrestrial life. Who knows who's out there. He needs an iridium bar to finish it./Bring the Explorer an Iridium Bar./Wizard (O)337/-1/5000/-1/true/Ah, precious iridium. You've done well, @. You have my gratitude. Now, leave.
Entries.124: ItemDelivery/Catch a Lingcod/Cpt Lannery is challenging you to catch a Lingcod./Bring Lannery a Lingcod./Willy (O)707/-1/550/-1/true/Hey, that's a real lunker! You've certainly got the angler's blood in you.$h
Entries.125: ItemDelivery/Exotic Spirits/Bobby wants to make a Coco-no-no, but he's missing the main ingredient./Bring Bobby a Coconut./Gus (O)88/-1/600/-1/true/Bobby baby bobby bubbi! Now there's a soothing sight for my winter eyes.$h#$b#It's going to be perfect for my coco-no-no. Thanks!

Entries.Phone_Marnie_Closed: Hello, you've reached Oscar's Hotel. My business hours are from 9AM to 4PM. Please come visit me then. *beep*
Entries.Phone_Marnie_ClosedDay: Hello, you've reached Oscar's Hotel. My shop is closed today.
Entries.Phone_Gus_Closed: Hello, this is Bobby from Bobby's Pizzas. We're currently closed, but please come by later if you'd like to try our daily special, '{0}'! *beep*
Entries.Phone_Gus_Festival: Hello, this is Bobby from Bobby's Pizzas. We're closed for the day. *beep*
Entries.Phone_Pierre_Open: Gil's Sweet Potato Mart! Oh, hello, @! Yes, I'm open until 5pm today. Please come by for great deals on seeds and produce! Goodbye. *click*
Entries.Phone_Pierre_Closed: Thank you for calling Gil's Sweet Potato Mart. We're closed at the moment, but our hours are 9AM to 5PM. See you then! *beep*
Entries.Phone_Pierre_Festival: Thank you for calling Gil's Sweet Potato Mart. We're closed today in observance of the festival. *beep*
Entries.Phone_Clint_Closed: You've reached Clunt's answering machine. I'm not available right now... My business hours are from 9AM to 4PM. *beep*
Entries.Phone_Clint_Festival: Hey, this is Clunt. I'm taking the day off today. *beep*

Entries.BathHouse_MensLocker.4: Buff Buoy's Locker... There's a bunch of pictures of bodybuilders taped inside the door.
Entries.Blacksmith.1: There's a tape inside 'The Essential Blues Collection, vol. 2
Entries.Blacksmith.2: You rifle through Clunt's personal effects. There's a stack of blacksmith aprons, some magazines, an old sword, and a nice picture of his mother.
Entries.Blacksmith.3: You rifle through Clunt's personal effects. There's a stack of blacksmith aprons, some magazines, an old sword, and a nice picture of his mother.
Entries.Blacksmith.4: Dear Emily,^I know you only think of me as a friend.^It's my fault. I'm too shy. I'll never have the courage to tell you the truth.^That's why I'm writing this letter to myself that I'll certainly crumple up and toss in the corner.
Entries.Blacksmith.5: It's a professional-grade furnace. Peering inside, you see molten metal bubbling and churning.
Entries.Blacksmith.6: It's a professional-grade furnace. Peering inside, you see molten metal bubbling and churning.
Entries.Blacksmith.7: Clunt's quality anvil. It's made from an iridium alloy.
Entries.Blacksmith.8: Clunt's quality anvil. It's made from an iridium alloy.
Entries.JoshHouse.1: Momma-^If you're reading this, it means I've passed on. I'm so sorry you had to go through this. Know that I love you both.^Don't be too upset, I'm with Yoba now. ^My final request: take care of Buff Buoy. He needs a family, something stable. He's a good kid.^ Love, ^Clara
Entries.JoshHouse.7: You peek into Buff Buoy's drawer. There's clothes, hair gel, and a box of gridball trading cards.
Entries.JoshHouse.8: You peek into Buff Buoy's drawer. There's clothes, hair gel, and a box of gridball trading cards.
Entries.JoshHouse.9: It's Buff Buoy's gridball helmet. Looks like he keeps it polished.
Entries.ManorHouse.1: King's oven could use a good cleaning.
Entries.ManorHouse.3: Won't you come by tomorrow night?^If you come through the back window no one will notice.^I'd like to see you more often.^I know you're busy but can't you make time for me?^I hope to see you tomorrow.^-O
Entries.ScienceHouse.7: It's some kind of device Paul's working on. It looks pretty scrappy.
Entries.SamHouse.9: JP's electric guitar. It has a pair of active pickups and a whammy bar.
Entries.SamHouse.11: It's JP's computer. He's got an extensive library of computer games.
Entries.spaceship.4: Don't forget to water your plant friends.
Entries.spaceship.5: Flashing buttons and levers. It looks complicated. Somehow it works despite being on fire.
Entries.BuoyHouse.1: It's a big anchor. It looks very heavy.
Entries.BuoyHouse.2: The Buoy's work desk. It's covered in seagull feathers.
Entries.BuoyHouse.3: There's message scratched into the wood: Never get lost again.
Entries.BuoyHouse.4: It's a very tall palm. It's imported from Calico Desert.
Entries.BuoyHouse.5: A globe with pins in it. They all stick in parts of the ocean.
Entries.Pizzeria.2: A 'Sabrina the Teenage Witch' marathon is on.
Entries.Pizzeria.3: It's an Italian recipe book, it's opened on a secret veggie chili recipe.
Entries.Pizzeria.4: It's a claw machine full of stuffed toys who look like Sad Ghost.
Entries.Pizzeria.7: Bobby is cooking some bobby baby delicious dishes.
Entries.Pizzeria.9: There are frozen steaks in the freezer. They look a bit... sloppy?
Entries.Town-Potat.1: The first batch of a giant sweet potato pie. It smells delicious.
Entries.Town-Potat.2: A giant sweet potato! No one knows where it came crashing from, but it sure looks scrumptious.
Entries.Town-Potat.3: A fragrant vase of summer flowers.
Entries.Town-Potat.4: The baked sweet potatoes look delicious.
Entries.Town-Potat.5: The table is filled with sweet potato dishes.
Entries.Town-Potat.6: Tourist: We came down to Pelican Town as soon as we heard about the giant sweet potato.
Entries.Town-Potat.7: Tourist: I'm a big fan of sweet potatoes, I had to come see this giant one with my own two eyes.
Entries.Town-Potat.8: The sweet potato roast, it is Nintendad's specialty.
Entries.Town-Potat.9: Tourist: Oh my, the sweet potato dishes here are truly excellent.
Entries.Town-Potat.10: Tourist: Pelican Town is known for its sweet potato specialties, but I think they've really outdone themselves this year
Entries.Town-Potat.11: Tourist: I brought my brother to the Sweet Potato Festival. He was so excited about it, he could barely sleep last night!
Entries.Town-Potat.12: Tourist: This is the best day ever!!! The giant sweet potato is my favorite!
Entries.Town-Potat.13: Who would put this rude sign hereâ€¦?
Entries.Town-Potat.14: Seems like Sweet Potato seeds are on sale today.
Entries.Town-Potat.15: A golden statue honouring the giant sweet potato.
Entries.Town-Potat.16: We were going to bomble, but King Bozo forbid it. He wasn't listening to me when I told him it was nothing like gambling.
Entries.Town-Potat.18: Tourist: It was a long bus ride here, but totally worth it! This valley is so beautiful.
Entries.Town-Potat.19: Bobby made some delicious Sweet Potato dishes.
Entries.PJRoom.1: Welcome to Welwick's Oracle... I sense that one lucky gamer will be showered with good fortune.
Entries.PJRoom.2: An interesting placement of the bed.
Entries.PJRoom.3: The fridge is filled with salads and spicy eels.
Entries.PJRoom.4: The book is filled with weird challenges.
Entries.PJRoom.6: The barrel is overflowing with prismatic shards.
Entries.PJRoom.8: The sack is filled with prismatic shards.
Entries.PJRoom.9: The wooden box seems handmade. It's filled to the brim with prismatic shards.
Entries.PJRoom.10: The hammer is engraved. It says: Badonk!
Entries.PJRoom.11: 'To dew list: 1. Do not talk about Fart Farm.' The other items are all crossed out.
Entries.PJShop.1: Fuji looks very comfortable on her bed.
Entries.PJShop.2: It's a poster made by PJ.
Entries.PJShop.3: The shelves are stacked with art supplies.
Entries.PJShop.4: These pots are very well made.
Entries.PJShop.7: A steaming cup of green tea.
Entries.PJShop.9: PJ's streaming setup. PJ must be pretty serious about streaming.
Entries.PJShop.11: It's a poster of a robot in a spotlight.
Entries.PJShop.12: It's filled with trash.. very unexpected.

Entries.PJShop.16: The cabinet is filled with different cloths for crafting.
Entries.OscarHotel.2: Looks like the guest's mail and room keys are stored here.
Entries.OscarHotel.3: Only hotel guests are allowed upstairs.
Entries.OscarHotel.5: It looks like white is winning.
Entries.OscarHotel.8: So many secrets in this drawer.
Entries.OscarHotel.11: There are blue feathers on some of the eggs.
Entries.OscarHotel.12: Octochef is hard at work, preparing food for everyone.
Entries.OscarHotel.15: The fridge is filled with food from Gil's.
Entries.OscarHotel.16: The milk must be from Oscar's cows.
Entries.OscarHotel.17: Who would eat cookies for breakfast?
Entries.OscarHotel.18: It's supposed to be a baloon animal, you think..
Entries.OscarHotel.19: There's a clown's nose stuffed in the drawer.
Entries.OscarHotel.22: The sign has 'ADVERT' written on it.

Entries.SeedShop.1: '11 Solo Sonatas For The Wooden Flute'
Entries.SeedShop.5: 'Divorce 101: How to live with your ex'
Entries.SeedShop.7: 'Journey Of The Prairie King: Console Edition'
Entries.SeedShop.9: To Mr. Gil:^It pains me to be the bearer of bad news, but I feel obligated to inform you of a recent development most threatening to your livelihood.^Joja Co. has decided to expand into Pelican Town.^It's too late for protest. Joja Builders have already broken ground for the new JojaMart.^^This must be devastating news for you. So many years in business...a local standby... and now, obscured by the shadow of a powerful, efficient, economically viable corporation. What a shame!^^As manager of the new JojaMart, I feel, to some degree, personally responsible for your predicament. As such, I'd like to offer you a position as Assistant Grocer. Wages start at 5g an hour. I look forward to seeing your resume!^^-Mr. Fuzzwald, Manager^Pelican Town JojaMart
Entries.SeedShop.12: This cupboard is full of exercise equipment.

Entries.GrandpaStory.cs.12051: Dear {0},^^If you're reading this, you must be in dire need of a change.^^The same thing happened to me, long ago. I'd lost sight of what mattered most in life... real connections with other people and nature. So I dropped everything and moved to the place I truly belong.^^^I've enclosed the deed to that place... my pride and joy: {1} Farm. It's located in Stardew Valley, on the southern coast. It's the perfect place to start your new life.^^This was my most precious gift of all, and now it's yours. I know you'll honor the family name, my boy. Good luck.^^Love, Grandpa^^P.S. If King Bozo is still alive say hi to the old guy for me, will ya?

Entries.Morris_PlayerSignedUp: Excellent! Welcome to Joja Corporation! Come back tomorrow and we can see about getting started on some community development projects... Oh, and don't forget your wallet! Hehe.#$b#Now, let me call King Bozo and see about gutting that nasty old community center...
Entries.Morris_ComeBackLater: Come back tomorrow and we can see about getting some community improvements started... Just make sure to bring a lot of money. Hehe.
Entries.Morris_Greeting: Welcome to JojaMart! How are you doing today?#$b#I don't believe we've met. I'm Fuzzwald, Joja Customer Satisfaction Representative.#$b#When you decide you want to become a Joja Member, I'll be delighted to help make your transition a joyous experience.
Entries.Morris_WeekendGreeting_MembershipAvailab: Welcome to JojaMart! How is your weekend going?#$b#Membership is now available! With a Joja Membership, you'll be able to make improvements in the community with the help of our dedicated personnel... for a fee, of course.#$b#Oh, and another thing... King Bozo promised us that if anyone else joined up, he'd let us turn that old community center into a Joja Warehouse. Isn't that wonderful?#$q -1 -1#Membership costs {0}g. Well, would you like to join us?#$r -1 -1 Yes#Yes.#$r -1 -1 No#No.
Entries.Morris_FirstGreeting_MembershipAvailable: Welcome to JojaMart! How are you doing today?#$b#Membership is now available! With a Joja Membership, you'll be able to make improvements in the community with the help of our dedicated personnel... for a fee, of course.#$b#Oh, and another thing... King Bozo promised us that if anyone else joined up, he'd let us turn that old community center into a Joja Warehouse. Isn't that wonderful?#$q -1 -1#Membership costs {0}g. Well, would you like to join us?#$r -1 -1 Yes#Yes.#$r -1 -1 No#No.
Entries.PurchasedItem_1_QualityHigh: Hey, {0}.#$b# So I stopped by Gil's the other day and bought {1} {2}. It was the first time I've seen one of those there in a while... #$b#I cooked it up for dinner last night... It filled the house with a {3} smell.. It was a hit!$h#$b#I'm glad Gil's stock is starting to expand again.#$e# Anyways...

It was the first time I've seen one of those there in a while... #$b#I cooked it up for dinner last night... It filled the house with a {3} odor. I don't even want to know where Gil found that thing.$s#$e# Anyways...

Entries.PurchasedItem_2_QualityHigh_Jodi: Hi... did you sell {1} {2} to the Sweet Potato Mart the other day? I think I bought it...#$e#It was pretty high-quality stuff. As soon as I smelled it I was back in Granny's old cottage...
Entries.PurchasedItem_2_QualityLow: Hi... did you sell {1} {2} to the Sweet Potato Mart the other day? I think I bought it...#$e#The quality was decent.
Entries.PurchasedItem_3_QualityLow_Rude: I went shopping last night and picked up {1} {2} on sale for only {3}g.#$e# It was {4}! No wonder Gil was selling that {5} for so cheap...
Entries.PurchasedItem_4: So I was at the store the other day and Gil showed me {1} {2} you brought in.#$e#I bought it.$h
Entries.PurchasedItem_5_VegetableOrFruit: I bought the tastiest {2} from Gil's shop the other day. #$b#He said that he grew the thing in his own backyard. I didn't know Gil was such a talented farmer!$h#$b#Looks like you might have some competition, huh?

Entries.PurchasedItem_5_Foraged: I bought the tastiest {2} from Gil's shop the other day. He said he found it himself while exploring the mountains. I didn't know Gil was such a talented forager!
Entries.PurchasedItem_Elliott: I saw that Gil had fresh {2} in the shop the other day! Marvelous. It smelled just perfect... and firm, too!
Entries.PurchasedItem_Leah: The other day I bought {1} {2} at Gil's. It was perfect on a bed of greens and a dash of my 'special' vinaigrette.

I'm impressed!#$e# Anyways...

Entries.Demetrius: Dear @,^I was conducting a field study the other day, and I found this specimen. ^I hope you find it as interesting as I did.    ^   -Bababooey%item id (O)392 1 (O)394 1 (O)132 1 (O)66 1 %%[#]A Gift From Bababooey
Entries.Linus: Hello, friend.^The mountain lake has been kind to me lately. I'd like to share my good fortune with you.  ^   -Nintendad %item id (O)136 1 (O)143 1 (O)202 1 (O)227 1 (O)228 1 %%[#]A Gift From Nintendad
Entries.Pierre: Dear valued customer,^Thanks for visiting 'Gil's'! Enclosed is your 'Cash-back Rewards Program' rebate. See you soon! ^   -Gil Harmon^  P.S. Sorry for the stock message, @. Enjoy! %item money 250 601  %%[#]A Gift From Gil
Entries.Caroline: Dear @,^Here's a vegetable from the little garden I keep out back. You probably have more veggies than you know what to do with, but oh well.   ^   -Jil%item id (O)190 1 (O)192 1 (O)24 1 %%[#]A Gift From Jil
Entries.George: Found some good quality stone. ^Maybe you can build with it or something.  ^   -George %item id (O)390 35 %%[#]A Gift From George
Entries.Lewis: @,^I'm really glad you've become part of our community! I've enclosed a 500g check from the Stardew Valley Agricultural Fund to help you continue your good work. ^Maybe you can buy some more seeds with it.  ^  Sincerely, King Bozo%item money 500 501 %%[#]A Gift From King Bozo
Entries.Gus: @!^I made you a little treat this morning in the Pizzeria. Dig in!   ^   -Your friend, Bobby%item id (O)224 1 (O)213 1 (O)211 1 (O)207 1 (O)200 1 (O)195 1 (O)198 1 %%[#]A Gift From Bobby
Entries.Clint: Um, Hello...     ^Sorry, I'm not good at writing letters. I made one metal bar too many, and I thought you might need it.  ^   -Clunt, the blacksmith %item id (O)334 1 (O)335 1 (O)336 1 %%[#]A Gift From Clunt
Entries.Marnie: Dear @,^You're such a good neighbor I thought I'd send over some animal feed to make your job easier. Keep it up! ^   -Oscar %item id (O)178 30 %%[#]A Gift From Oscar
Entries.Wizard: Greetings, young adept.^I have enclosed in this package an item of arcane significance. Use it wisely.   ^   -Tiny Planet Explorer%item id (O)422 1 (O)82 1 (O)84 1 (O)70 1 %%[#]A Gift From the Explorer
Entries.afterSamShow: @,^the show was a rockin' success! I wanted to say thanks again for all your help in creating this amazing band. We couldn't have done it without you!   ^   -JP[#]JP's Thank-you Note
Entries.afterArtShow: Dear @,^Thanks again for coming to my art show. It was such a success! I sold nearly all of my sculptures, and everyone was so positive and encouraging! I hope to see you again soon.  ^   -Leah[#]Leah's Thank-you Note
Entries.Duck: Dear @,^You've proven your ability to raise chickens, so I'm now selling ducks at my shop!       ^   -Oscar[#]Ducks For Sale!
Entries.Rabbits: Dear @,^I now have rabbits in the animal shop! They will provide you with fluffy wool ...and more!       ^   -Oscar[#]Rabbits For Sale!
Entries.Sheep: Dear @,^You've proven your ability to raise cows, so I'm now selling sheep at my shop!       ^   -Oscar[#]Sheep For Sale!
Entries.Goats: Dear @,^I now have goats available for purchase at the animal shop. You've done well so far!       ^   -Oscar[#]Goats For Sale!
Entries.Pigs: Dear @,^You've come a long way since you first arrived. As a result, I've decided to start selling pigs at my shop. These pigs are trained at finding gourmet truffles!       ^   -Oscar[#]Pigs For Sale!
Entries.SeaAmulet: @,^I'm going to give you this advice because I like you and I want you to stay in Pelican Town. If there comes a day that you want to ask for someone's hand in marriage, you'll need to give them a 'Mermaid's Pendant'. Don't worry, everyone in Pelican Town understands the significance of the amulet. It's an ancient tradition in this region. Good luck! ^   -King Bozo[#]About Mermaid's Pendants
Entries.Bouquet: @,^It seems like you're starting to get close with some of the townspeople. If you want to show someone that you're romantically interested, you've got to give them one of my beautiful flower bouquets. I'm selling them now, for a very fair price! If you want to start a family someday, this is the first step! ^   -Gil Harmon[#]About Bouquets
Entries.DemetriusCooking: I wanted to say 'thanks' for taking an interest in my work. Here's a cooking recipe that I like. ^   -Bababooey%item cookingRecipe %%[#]Bababooey' Recipe
Entries.LinusCooking: @,^how are you doing? I've enclosed some instructions on how to make one of my favorite fish recipes. ^   -Nintendad%item cookingRecipe %%[#]Nintendad' Recipe
Entries.PierreCooking: TOP SECRET:^Here's the recipe for my famous blueberry tart.^Don't tell anyone! I'm giving it to you because we are such good friends. ^   -Gil Harmon%item cookingRecipe %%[#]Gil's Famous Tart
Entries.CarolineCooking: Dear @,^nothing is more satisfying than cooking with fresh vegetables from your own garden! I've enclosed a recipe to help you out. Take care, ^   -Jil%item cookingRecipe %%[#]Jil's Recipe
Entries.GeorgeCooking: Figured I'd give you this recipe I had laying around. Try not to burn it. ^   -George%item cookingRecipe %%[#]George's Recipe
Entries.LewisCooking: @,^remember to eat healthy, or you won't have enough energy to work hard! I'm including one of my favorite recipes. Make sure to use ripe tomatoes! ^   -King Bozo%item cookingRecipe %%[#]King Bozo's Recipe
Entries.GusCooking: Dear @,^Here's a recipe from my Pizzeria. I only share this with my good friends! ^   -Bobby%item cookingRecipe %%[#]Bobby's Recipe
Entries.ClintCooking: Well, I know a couple of recipes.^I thought I'd send you one... maybe it'll help you mine more ore or something.^Take care. ^   -Clunt%item cookingRecipe %%[#]Clunt's Recipe
Entries.MarnieCooking: Dear neighbor,^when I'm not taking care of animals I like to experiment in the kitchen. Since we've become friends I want to share some recipes with you.^I hope you like this! ^   -Oscar%item cookingRecipe %%[#]Oscar's Recipe
Entries.WillyCooking: Dear @,^I'd like to share an ol' cooking recipe my pappy used to make. It's important the fish is FRESH.  ^   -Lannery Storm%item cookingRecipe %%[#]Lannery's Ol' Recipe
Entries.pierreBackpack: ADVERTISEMENT:^"I keep finding cool stuff, but my backpack is full!"^^Does this sound like you? Well, Gil's got you covered!^^Stop by Gil's Sweet Potato Mart TODAY and check out our affordable size 24 backpack!^ See you soon![#]Backpacks From Gil's
Entries.pierreHours: ADVERTISEMENT:^^The Sweet Potato Mart is now open 7 days a week![#]Gil's Extended Hours
Entries.quest10: @,^I've heard you've been giving some people a hand around town! Everyone seems really thankful. I'm awarding you this month's "Best Neighbor" award (with a small cash prize). Keep it up! ^   -King%item money 500 501 %%[#]Best Neighbor
Entries.quest35: Dear @,^You've been such a help around town since you moved here... everyone keeps telling me all the wonderful things you've done for them! Please accept this thank-you prize. ^   -King%item money 2500 2501 %%[#]Thank-you From King Bozo
Entries.quest100: @,^I am pleased to announce that you've been chosen as "Neighbor of the year"! That comes with a 10,000g prize! Congratulations! Everyone in town wants to say 'thanks' for all you've done. ^   -King%item money 10000 10001 %%[#]Neighbor Of The Year
Entries.CF_Fish: Dear @,^ Your angling skills surpass even my ol' Pappy's... I'm impressed. ^ This stardrop's been passed down from Lannery Sr. to Lannery Jr. for... oh, heck. Prob'ly a thousand years.^Seein' as I don't have any kids... I want you to have it.^^ -Lannery Storm  ^  %item id (O)434 1 %%[#]Lannery's Family Heirloom
Entries.fertilizers: Dear neighbor,^I hope you are feeling settled in your new home. I am writing to let you know that Gil's store is now selling fertilizers! Why don't you swing by and see if you can afford a few dozen boxes or so?  ^   -Gil Harmon[#]Gil's Fertilizers
Entries.fertilizers2: Dear @,^I am now selling higher quality fertilizers, as well as new crop selections! See you soon. ^   -Gil Harmon[#]Gil's High Quality Fertilizers
Entries.hatter: Hi.^^Me sell hats. Okay, poke?^^Come to old old old haus, poke. Bring coines.^^-hat mouse[#]Hiyo, Poke
Entries.elliottReading: @,^I have great news... my novel is finished!! I'm giving a public reading this afternoon at the library. Hope to see you there! ^   -Buoy[#]Buoy's Reading
Entries.elliottBoat: Meet me at the docks on a sunny morning. I've got something in mind. ^   -Buoy[#]Buoy's Note
Entries.harveyBalloon: @,^I have a surprise for you. Meet me by the railroad tracks. ^   -PJ[#]PJ's Surprise
Entries.samMessage: @,^meet me in front of my house tonight after dark. ^   -JP[#]JP's Note
Entries.joshMessage: @,^meet me at the Pizzeria tonight after dark. ^   -Alex[#]Alex' Invitation
Entries.lewisStatue: @,^^In the future, I'd appreciate it very much if you refrained from placing my PRIVATE belongings in town for all to see!^^I'm very displeased!^^Take this money and never speak of my 'project' to anyone.%item money 750 751 %%[#]King Bozo' Angry Letter
Entries.marnieAutoGrabber: @,^I've got a new item in stock... It's called the "Auto-Grabber".^^This thing can milk your cows and goats, shear your sheep, gather eggs, and pluck your wooly rabbits... all on its own!^^It's considered a 'luxury item', so I'm charging 25,000g.^^    -Oscar[#]Auto-Grabber Notice
Entries.EmilyClothingTherapy: @,^I have this crazy new idea that I want to involve you in... It's called "Clothing Therapy".^^Please come to the King's house today to see what it's all about.^^ Love, Emily[#]Emily's Idea
Entries.foundLostTools: Dear @,^Someone dropped your tools into the lost and found bin last night.^^Stop by the King's office to pick them up. ^^  -King Bozo[#]Lost Tools
Entries.fishing2: I've got some new items in stock...^A deluxe fishing pole and some bait that you can attach to it!^You can use bait to make fish bite faster. Hope to see you soon! ^   -Lannery Storm[#]Lannery's New Items
Entries.fishing6: Come by the shop and check out the new rods I'm selling.^They're the best money can buy... and you can customize them with different kinds of tackle!^Hope to see you soon! ^   -Lannery Storm[#]Lannery's New Items #2
Entries.wizardJunimoNote: My sources tell me you've been poking around inside the old community center.^Why don't you pay me a visit?^My spaceship is west of the forest lake. I may have information concerning your... 'rat problem'.^   -Tiny Planet Explorer %item quest 1 true %%[#]Explorer's Summons
Entries.winter_18: Dear @,^I would like to give you some information about an upcoming event: the Feast of the Winter Star. It's a time for the community to come together and think back on all the good fortune we've had this year.^A favorite tradition is the "secret gift exchange", where everyone in town is randomly assigned to someone else. On the day of the festival, everyone brings a gift for their secret friend and surprises them with something special!^This year, your secret friend is:^    %secretsanta ^Don't tell anyone! The feast will take place on the 25th from 9AM to 2PM at the town square. See you then! ^   -King Bozo[#]Secret Gift-Giver
Entries.ccBulletinThankYou: Dear @,^Everyone around town has been talking about your great generosity lately!^Apparently, packages have been appearing in people's houses containing items they posted about years ago on the community center bulletin! And the packages are all addressed from your farm!^Thanks for going out of your way to do something like that... all of us in town are delighted! ^   -King Bozo[#]Bulletin Board Thank-you
Entries.landslideDone: To our valued JojaMart customers:^Our team members have removed the landslide caused by our drilling operation near the mountain lake. I'd like to remind you that our drilling operation is entirely legal (pursuant to init. L61091, JojaCo Amendment). Responsible stewardship of the local environment is our top priority! ^^We apologize for any inconvenience this accident may have caused.^As always, we value your continued support and patronage!^^-Fuzzwald,^Joja Customer Satisfaction Representative[#]Joja Removed Landslide
Entries.spring_2_1: Hello there,^Just got back from a fishing trip. You should come down to the beach some time.^I've got something for ya.^-Lannery Storm%item quest 13 true %%[#]Lannery's Invitation
Entries.spring_12: Dear @,^Tomorrow we're holding the Egg Festival in the town square. ^^You should arrive between 9 AM and 2 PM if you'd like to attend.^You wouldn't want to miss the annual egg hunt!^  -King Bozo[#]Egg Festival Notice
Entries.spring_23: Dear @,^Tomorrow we're all getting together for the Flower Dance.^^If you can find a partner, you might even want to participate in the dance yourself!^There's a little clearing beyond the forest west of town where we hold the dance. Arrive between 9 AM and 2 PM if you're interested.^  -King Bozo[#]Flower Dance Notice
Entries.summer_10: Dear @,^Tomorrow we're all gathering at the beach for the annual Pelican Town Luau.^^The highlight of the event is the communal potluck. Make sure you bring something good to contribute!^The governor himself is attending the event, so make sure you're on your best behavior.^Come to the beach sometime between 9 AM and 2 PM.^   -King Bozo[#]Luau Notice
Entries.summer_28: Dear @,^Tonight at around 10 o'clock PM, a rare and beautiful event will take place.^^The moonlight jellies will be passing by Pelican Town on their long journey south for the winter.^^We're all gathering at the beach to watch. You don't want to miss this!^See you tonight,^ -Bababooey[#]Dance Of The Moonlight Jellies
Entries.fall_9: Dear @,^One week from today, we are holding the Stardew Valley Fair in the town square!^It's the biggest event of the year, drawing people from all across the country to our humble town.^If you'd like, you can set up a grange display for the event. Just bring up to 9 items that best showcase your talents. You'll be judged on the quality and diversity of your display.^The fair starts at 9 AM... don't miss it!^   -King Bozo[#]Stardew Valley Fair Notice
Entries.fall_15: Dear @,^I just want to remind you that the Stardew Valley Fair is happening tomorrow.^Don't forget to bring your 9 items for the grange display.^Remember, the fair starts at 9AM in the town square. See you there!^   -King Bozo[#]Stardew Valley Fair Reminder
Entries.fall_26: Dear @,^Notice a chill in the air? It could just be the approach of winter...^Or it could be the tingle of a dark specter, here to help us celebrate tomorrow's festival... the Spirit's Eve.^Come to town at 10 PM if you'd like to participate.^  -King Bozo[#]Spirit's Eve Notice
Entries.winter_7: Dear @,^Tomorrow we're all gathering in front of Oscar's Hotel for the Festival of Ice.^^It's a celebration of winter... there'll be snowmen, ice sculptures, and an ice fishing competition!^Arrive between 9 AM and 2 PM if you'd like to participate.^  -King Bozo[#]Festival Of Ice Notice
Entries.winter_14: Starting tomorrow, a traveling merchant fleet will dock at Pelican Town for the yearly night market.^^The market starts at 5pm, and will be in port for the next three days.^^Please visit the beach after 5pm to join the festivities. There's free coffee![#]Night Market Notice
Entries.summer_3_1: @-^This is embarrassing... I lost my lucky purple shorts. I'm telling you because I think I can trust you.^If you find them, bring them back to me DISCREETLY. I'll pay well.^Thanks.^   -King Bozo%item quest 102 %%[#]King Bozo Asks For A Favor
Entries.summer_20_1: @-^I'm gathering data on the correlation between soil alkalinity and crop fructose levels. Long story short, I need a fresh melon from your farm. If you brought me one I'd be very grateful.^   -Bababooey%item quest 104 %%[#]Bababooey Asks For A Sample
Entries.summer_25_1: To Farmer @:^My knee's acting up again, and you know what helps? ^Rubbing the darn thing with hot pepper.^ Trouble is, my supply's run dry. If you've got one to spare I'd be much obliged.^   -George %item quest 105 %%[#]George Needs A Pepper
Entries.fall_3_1: Dear @,^I'd like to give my cows a special treat. They're such good girls and hungry, too. Could you bring me one bunch of amaranth? They love the stuff. ^Thanks, Dear.^   -Oscar %item quest 106 %%[#]Oscar's Request
Entries.fall_8_1: Hello,^It's blackberry season right now. The bushes are full of them. I want to pick some, but I lost my basket. Can you help?^   -Nintendad%item quest 107 %%[#]Nintendad Lost His Basket
Entries.fall_19_1: @-^I'd like to buy a pumpkin from you. My daughter and I want to carve a jack-o-lantern for the upcoming Spirit's Eve festival. ^   -Jil%item quest 108 %%[#]Jil's Request
Entries.winter_2_1: Hey, I've got a little challenge for you:^    Catch me a squid.^You can fish them from the ocean at night. They only show up in the winter, though.^   -Lannery Storm%item quest 109 %%[#]Lannery's Challenge
Entries.winter_6_1: I've got an unusual request. Could you keep this a secret?^ I want you to deliver an amethyst to Emily. It's her favorite stone. Tell her it's from me.^   -Clunt %item quest 110 %%[#]Clunt's Unusual Request
Entries.winter_12_1: @-^I am researching black holes. I require an item known as 'Void Essence'. Bring it to me and you will be rewarded.^ -The Tiny Planet Explorer %item quest 111 %%[#]Explorer's Request
Entries.winter_17_1: @,^Sorry to bother you again, but I need another favor.^I got a new hammer and I want to try it on a variety of metals.^Could you smelt an iron bar and bring it to me? ^Thanks.^ -Clunt %item quest 112 %%[#]Clunt's Request
Entries.winter_26_1: Dear @-^I want to make fish stew, but I need an albacore! I know they're almost out of season... sorry about the short notice. Could you catch one for me?^   -Bobby%item quest 114 %%[#]Bobby Needs A Certain Fish
Entries.spring_1_2: Notice:^^The price of raw materials at Robin's shop and Clunt's shop has increased.[#]Raw Material Price Notice
Entries.spring_21_2: NOTICE^Gil Harmon here... I really, really want a plate of sashimi. I'll pay top coin to whoever brings me some.^   -Gil Harmon%item quest 117 %%[#]Gil's Craving
Entries.summer_6_2: Fisherman Wanted^I need a good pufferfish specimen. I'm conducting an experiment on the toxin created by the pufferfish.^Reward: 1000g^ -Bababooey%item quest 118 %%[#]Bababooey' Study On Toxins
Entries.summer_21_2: @,^I need truffle oil. Don't ask me why.^ -King Bozo%item quest 120 %%[#]King Bozo' Request
Entries.fall_6_2: Wanted: 1 Fresh Lobster for a marvelous bisque I'm creating.^Who: Bobby, proprietor of the Bobby's Pizzas^Reward: 800g %item quest 121 %%[#]Bobby Needs Lobster
Entries.winter_5_2: @,^I'm creating a new spacecraft.^However, I'm missing something: an Iridium Bar.^I'm willing to pay 5x the market value for it. Bring it as soon as you can.^ -The Tiny Planet Explorer %item quest 123 %%[#]Explorer Needs A Rare Item
Entries.winter_13_2: I've got another challenge for you: Catch me a Lingcod.^They don't go down easy, but I know you can do it.^  -Lannery Storm%item quest 124 %%[#]Lannery's Challenge #2

Entries.passedOut3_Billed: @,^Someone dropped you off at my place last night for some reason. I am your streamer, not your doctor!^You've got to take better care of yourself bozo.^I've billed you {0}g to cover the costs for the green tea I gave you to recover.^^- PJ[#]From the Luckiest gamer
Entries.passedOut3_NotBilled: @,^Dragged you through the mud and into your bed last night..^Since you have no money, this time it will be free of charge.^But next time can I have got the money for this?^^-PJ[#]From the Luckiest gamer
Entries.passedOut4: @, ^^Found you face-down in the mud when I came back from my late-night skull mines dive.^^You should try to make it home a little earlier next time!^^     -PJ[#]Note From PJ
Entries.elliottLetter1: @, my love,^^I've just arrived in Grampleton, to start the tour. I've forgotten how hectic the city is! The streets are packed with people... they either seem in a mad hurry, or lost in a daze, unaware of their surroundings. I miss Pelican Town already!^^I begin the tour this evening, at a local bookstore. I must admit, I'm becoming a bit nervous at the thought of public speaking... my stomach feels as if it's been twisted into a soft pretzel and doused with spicy cheese dip. Wish me luck!^^-Love, Buoy^^P.S. I hope you had a peaceful night, and weren't too scared all alone in that big house! %item conversationTopic ElliottGone2 0 %%[#]Letter From My Husband
Entries.elliottLetter2: My dear @,^^The first reading went well, though the audience was a bit smaller than I'd hoped. Still, I sold enough copies of the book to pay for my (bug-infested) hotel room!^^In a few hours, I leave for Zuzu City. If yesterday's reading was a warm-up, this next one will be a true napalm blast...^^I miss you very much. Remember to eat well! Oh, and don't forget the leftover crab cakes I put in the fridge...^-Love, Buoy %item conversationTopic ElliottGone3 0 %%[#]Letter From My Husband 2
Entries.elliottLetter3: My sweet @,^^Last night in Zuzu City was quite the experience! It seems there's a large literary scene here... a few dozen people showed up at my reading!^^I even signed a couple of autographs... it's strange to be seen as someone important. It's all a matter of framing, a grand illusion... for truly I am no one special. Only your devoted Buoy, as always.^^Currently I'm alone, in my hotel room, 'ingesting' a Joja Value Meal...^^Should this be called 'food'?^Or 'edible matter'?^I needn't long brood^It must be the latter^^I look forward to returning home soon. Hope you enjoyed the crab cakes.^^-Love, Buoy %item conversationTopic ElliottGone4 0 %%[#]Letter From My Husband 3
Entries.elliottLetter4: In dreams, when graced with lofty view^I gaze upon the sunlit sea^What distant shores I've traveled to^But time now clouds my memory^^There is but one eternal place^Where I shall someday pass beyond^In Valley dear, where my love waits:^Our little home beside the pond^^-Buoy %item conversationTopic ElliottGone5 0 %%[#]Letter From My Husband 4
Entries.elliottLetter5: My dear @,^^I won't bore you with any more details about my readings. They are mostly the same.^^I'm sure your time has been much more exciting! I can't wait to return and see what progress has been made.^^On these long travels between towns, I amuse myself by closing my eyes and envisioning the farm... I see kegs pulsing with sweet wine, a furnace ablaze with precious ore, and our little kitchen with the smell of cinnamon and nutmeg. There's a lot to enjoy!^^Just don't stay out too late in the mines, my love. It's dangerous in there! If you must go... bring plenty of food.^^-Love, Buoy %item conversationTopic ElliottGone6 0 %%[#]Letter From My Husband 5
Entries.elliottLetter6: My dear @,^^This will be my last letter before I return home. I've had a fine trip... though nothing too exciting. It's been nice to meet people who enjoy my work, but I'm eager to return home.^^I look forward to the comfort of our little house, the satisfying farm work, a home-cooked meal, and most of all, cozying into the flannel sheets with you.^^See you soon!^-Love, Buoy %item conversationTopic ElliottGone7 0 %%[#]Letter From My Husband 6
Entries.CarolineTea: Dear @,^^Thanks for stopping by my sunroom yesterday. I usually drink tea alone, but it was fun to share with you!^^I've enclosed instructions on how to prepare and grow your own tea. No pressure, but if you do end up growing some, make sure to bring me a cup!^^-Jil%item craftingRecipe Tea_Sapling %%[#]Jil's Tea Note
